reviewText:
geile sexy Greta. Habe den Film mal auf VHS gesehen, suche ihn schon seit vielen Jahren als PAL-Fassung, engl oder deutsch, egal. Meines Wissens gibt es aber keine deutsche Fassung.

Die biestige Greta schreit viel rum, wird schn gefoltert, alles auf die bliche Fun-Troma Art. Natrlich kein A-Film, aber ganz top.

Happy to track this one down since I saw it years ago on TV.  Lesbian Nazis, muscular skinheads, sexy federal agents, martial arts,  this little exploitation film has them all... ridiculous but kind of fun nevertheless.  Probably not a film to show your mother.

It arrived in a reasonable time.  The video was exceptional for its age and use.  It also was wrapped making it look new.  Awesome.  I don't understand why Troma didn't put this out on DVD.  You can't even order this movie in any format on their website.

Due to the fact that Amazon only allows me 1000 words, i won't have much room to tell you about this movie. This Troma movie was made to be appealing for everyone  from Hardcore Troma fans to those who are leary  about viewing a movie from the same people who brought you the glorious and  gory-ous "Redneck Zombies" and "Toxic Avenger". I don't  want to say too much of the plot because I don't want to spoil the  suprises. Basically its about Femme Fontaine who is a Killer Babe for the  C.I.A. (suprised yet) and she needs to stop the evil Lesbian FemiNazis .  Its a film you really need to sit down to understand and its a wild ride.  It also had better explosions then most Troma movies.
  As a hardcore  Troma fan , i recomend this to whoever enjoyed "Sgt, Kabukiman"  and "Blonds Have More Guns" , but from a normal movie goer's  perspective, I just plain recommend this movie !  Its Troma at its almost  best.
